parameters: "A dark and moist high school that looms deep in the
"One would think this is no place for youth to grow up in,
but one would simply be wrong in that hasty assessment."
The dungeon academy of Fear & Hunger..."
"A very special high school only for the most special students
"I dont know how I got to attend this school among the
hundreds of thousands of other applicants."
"Maybe it was by miraculous fate, a coin toss by the gods
"Whatever is the case, I feel honored and full of pride in
knowing that one day I will rank among the very few who
"... and endured the fear and the hunger this dungeon high
"In any case, before we go any further, let me introduce
"I'm Cahara of the South. Pleased to meet you."
"The thing is, Im really in a world of trouble. The academy
is going to have its annual harvest festival soon."
"And with the festival, there is also going to be a prom."
"It is the pinnacle of each academic year and not attending
the event would deem one socially awkward for the rest of
his or her academic career here."
"The school has this very strict policy of either adapting
to its bizarre ways or getting swallowed up whole by its
"So failing to attend the prom is not an option."
"The problem is... One needs a partner for the prom. You
cannot get in alone. And in order to get a partner, you
actually have to get other people to like you."
"It is really a modern version of the chivalrous battles
the knights of the olden times had with dragons and other
"The ultimate social challenge where the stakes are the
"But I cannot let this menacing threat scare me. I need to
step up and look into the empty eye sockets of the death
"I have five days to get a date for the prom. Wish me

"The feeling of fear shows its beautiful head in situations

"Physical threat is often more straightforward and its
usually directly linked to our survival. Or it might

loss of our social roles, destruction of our identity or

"One of the core elements of fear is the feeling of disgust
"As examples - A physical fear of contamination might come
from things that are rotten andor alien to us, where there
